values: To adjoin something means to be next to or attached to something else.
She can listen to her brother’s conversations because her room adjoins his.

- vi. 毗连，邻接
- vt. 毗连，邻接


时 态:  
adjoined, adjoining, adjoins
v. （建筑、房间或土地等）毗邻，连接
vt.& vi.邻近，毗连,接，贴连,附加，使结合
vi. 毗连，邻接; vt. 毗连，邻接 时 态: adjoined, adjoining, adjoins
贴近， 紧挨， 毗连
vt. 毗连，邻接,vi. 毗连，邻接
